Imp1

Griswold    
HP   1,000,000
MP   0
Damage   15,570-15,590
Armor   100(50%)
Abilities Disease Cloud(Aura) Plagues heroes within 550 AOE that deals 491 DPS for 12 seconds.
Passive 30% chance to deal 3x damage.  
  20% chance to evade.  
  True sight.

  True sight.
